a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Female employment vs. public spending on family benefits, 2015
The horizontal axis shows female employment-to-population ratios. This measures the proportion of a country's
female population (15+) that is employed. The vertical axis shows public spending on family benefits as share of
Data source: OECD (2016); International Labour Organization (via World Bank)
